item.title: How I created this blog
item.description: How I created this blog Fri, Apr 24, 2020 I wanted to write a blog about my start-up story. For that I needed a blog. This is the story of its creation. From it’s name, to the design, to the implementation. The concepts and tools I used included. 01 Why I created this blog? Make personal goals public to achieve them Create inspiring blog articles for others
